text: aur ham to paigambaron ko sirph isalie bhejate hain ki (achchhon ko nijaat kee) khushakhabaree sunaenaur (badon ko azaab se) daraenaur jo log kaaphir hain jhootee jhootee baaton ka sahaara pakad ke jhagada karate hai taaki usakee badaulat haq ko (usakee jagah se ukhaad pheken aur un logon ne meree aayaton ko jis (azaab se) ye log darae gae haisee thththa (mazaak) bana rakha hai
